entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow in the morning and with periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 early in the afternoon then northwest 30 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow and local blowing snow late in the evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
